row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 7)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 9)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 11)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 1)
col_desc: Queen has one mini challenge win.
Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
Queen has at least one lip sync win.
